history.proof: intros. qsimpl use: sum_n_m_Chasles. qsimpl use: sum_n_m_Chasles,le_S_n. qsimpl use: sum_n_m_Chasles,le_S_n. hauto lq: on use: sum_n_n, Nat.le_succ_diag_r unfold: sum_n_m.

exceptions.tactic: intros G a m n H.
intros G' a m n H.
intros G' a' m n H.
intros G' a' m' n H.
intros G' a' m' n' H.

original: intros G a m n H. apply sum_n_m_Chasles. apply Peano.le_S_n in H. apply Peano.le_S_n. apply Nat.le_trans with (S m). - apply Peano.le_n_S. apply Nat.le_0_l. - apply H.
